snippet.title: December Update 2021 | Trailer | Fireworks Mania | Steam
snippet.description:
Update will drop on Steam, the 16th of December 2021.
➤ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1079260?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=youtube_video_2021dec_trailer

# ALSO CHECK OUT THESE VIDEOS
➤ A day in the life of a game dev with a full time day job
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GJfdvpVJRHg
➤ 1.5 Years of Game Development in Unity
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g-vlB8R6b9Q
➤ Fireworks Mania Weekly Game Dev Log Playlist
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfRfKfCcFo_s49jOqbJv9rZBOHAdBLgFf

# PEOPLE PLAYING FIREWORKS MANIA
➤ https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfRfKfCcFo_vIxxYpVQ-vNg8KfEX4r_Y-

# SOCIAL
Discord: https://discord.gg/SzZD77p
Twitter: https://twitter.com/laumania
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/laumania

# GAME DESCRIPTION
FIREWORKS MANIA is a small casual explosive simulator game where you play around with fireworks, create beautiful firework shows or just blow stuff up.

# MUSIC
"You So Zany" by Audionautix is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license. https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Artist: http://audionautix.com/

#steam #fireworks #trailer
